titles.title: International Nuclear Energy Financing Act of 2021

To require the Secretary of the Treasury to instruct the United States Executive Director at the World Bank and other international financial institutions to support assistance for nuclear energy, and for other purposes.
International Nuclear Energy Financing Act of 2021

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Financial Services.

bill.summary:
International Nuclear Energy Financing Act of 2021
This bill requires the U.S. Executive Director at the International Bank for Reconstruction and Development (and the U.S. Executive Director at any other international financial institution deemed appropriate) to support financial assistance for the generation and distribution of nuclear energy, consistent with U.S. national security interests.
